item.title: Report E-2024100197
item.description:
Report E-2024100197

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-09T09:22:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-09
  • City: LANDOVER
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0959 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported approximately 1 ounce of pc5 economy lacquer thinner released from 55-gallon metal drum due to improper loading. The release impacted inside trailer#317-3916. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. 217159-1 65-gallon metal drum overpack and was staged for terminal personnel to manage.
